sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app-bar
    app
    flat
    >
    <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="toggleDrawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    <!-- <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="toggleDrawer = !toggleDrawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon> -->
    <!-- <v-img
        alt="Hellmann"
        class="shrink mr-2"
        contain
        src="../assets/logoHWL.png"
        transition="scale-transition"
        width="140"
    />    -->
    {{ drawer}}
    <v-toolbar-title>Application</v-toolbar-title>
  </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
import { mapState } from 'vuex'

export default {
  data () {
      return {

  }
},
computed: {
    ...mapState('custom', ['drawer']),

    toggleDrawer: {
      get() {
        this.drawer
      },
      set(newVal) {
          this.$store.commit('custom/setDrawer', newVal)
      }
    }
}
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
